channel.title: A little help please?
channel.description: I made a auto cache download client and now I need to make the download url (something like http://www.server.com/downloads/cache.zip) where it downloads the cache, I can't make it mediafire or something. Please feel free to comment if you want more info. Edit: Yes, I have used the search bar.

item.title: A little help please?
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“Hot_Potato, post:5, topic:417556”]It doesn’t work :P[/quote]sorry for wasin your time, thought it will.

item.title: A little help please?
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“Hot_Potato, post:3, topic:417556”][quote author=Mikeyzzz link=topic=520111.msg3776777#msg3776777 date=1318148551]

I made a auto cache download client and now I need to make the download url (something like http://www.server.com/downloads/cache.zip) where it downloads the cache, I can’t make it mediafire or something.
Please feel free to comment if you want more info.

upload it to uppit and then when you go to download, right click the download button and press the copy link adress…
and add that to the download link,
[/quote]

mate that works for any uploadnig site
Uppit isn’t very reliable, but I guess for now I need to use it.[/quote]

Read full topic
